title: JI-LIFE SCHOLARSHIPS MODULE
text: JI-LIFE SCHOLARSHIP MODULE offers the information of all current scholarships open for application and the application process can easily be monitored by applicators here.
JI-LIFE SCHOLARSHIP MODULE may collect personal information:

content: when you register with Jaccount, when you use JI-LIFE SCHOLARSHIP MODULE
when you upload files for application

text: JI-LIFE uses information for the following general purposes:

content: to customize the content you see
to help the school authority to simplify application process

text: JI-LIFE does not rent, sell, or share personal information about you except for to school authorities.
